sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import TagsComponent from './Tags/TagsComponent' function SearchResultItem(props) { const { item, setTagList, tagList, setData } = props const tagInput = React.createRef() const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false) const [tags, setTags] = useState([]) const [tagValue, setTagValue] = useState('') function handleButtonClick(e) { setIsExpanded(!isExpanded) } const onTagInputAreaChange = (e) => { setTagValue(e.target.value) } const addtag = () => { setTags([...tags, tagValue]) tagInput.current.value = '' setTagList([...tagList, tagValue]) // changing the state of data // setData({ ...data, tag: { ...data.tag } }) setData({ data: { ...data, tags: tags } }) } return ( <>

{item.name}

Full Name : {item.biography.fullName}
Race : {item.appearance.race}
Alignment: {item.biography.alignment}
Publisher: {item.biography.publisher}
{isExpanded && (

Powers

Intelligence: {item.powerstats.intelligence}
strength: {item.powerstats.strength}
speed: {item.powerstats.speed}
durability: {item.powerstats.durability}
power: {item.powerstats.power}
combat: {item.powerstats.combat}

Tags

onTagInputAreaChange(e)} ref={tagInput} />
{tags.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} ))}
)}
) } export default SearchResultItem
